text:
I have Tomcat 5.0.16 installed on our server, and after a installation of a 
webapp(Livelink MeetingZone 2.1), I wasn't able to log back into the admin 
page.  I check the conf/tomcat-user.xml, it seems to be correct, but I can't 
login..
creator: William.Tsoi@enbridge.com
remm@apache.org
text:
I can't reproduce this. I don't want to install "Livelink MeetingZone" or
anything: please explain how to reproduce this issue without this.
